tdam

Class Unit

  • java.lang.Object
    • tdam.Unit

  • public class Unit
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for a unit in the network.

    A unit stores an id to identify it, can hold any kind of data pattern, has an input value, a trace value, a signal sum, an old (previous) signal sum and a prediction error. Also stores all incoming and all outgoing associations for faster access.

    Author:
    Matthias Keysermann
